person.persName: Charles F. Bosley (Washington county farmer, sheriff)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Son of Gideon Bosley and Elizabeth Fleece Bosley. Married to Eudotia B. Barbour in Washington County on August 17, 1836. Worked four years in a mercantile business in Springfield, Kentucky. Farmer in Washington County. Elected sheriff of Washington County in August 1864. Owned eleven enslaved persons in 1850.
